subject: Re: [LH] And now for something completely different
body:
On 5/11/07, Ted Jacobs  wrote:
> [URL removed to protect the innocent]
>
> I happen to be guest DJing at NY's longest running Goth-Industrial party
> next week. I am sooo not spinning this for fear I might get a ceremonial
> dagger in my throat :-D

For posting that...
May a vampire make you undead and strap you in a chair for all
enternity to watch that.

-- 
pDale
Desperation = a rope enDs it
